p: There was a significant reduction (p < 0.05) in viable astrocytes after 3 h of anoxia treatment compared to control ( Fig. 4b). This showed that anoxia may result in a reduction of metabolic activity which could be a contributory mechanism in causing the death of cells. When cells were treated with TT before subjecting them to 3 h anoxic condition, the total number of viable cells was significantly higher (p < 0.05) than untreated cells. This implied that TT protected cells against anoxic injury and death.
